name: BEAR THE SHARK
description:
BEAR THE SHARK

KEEP UP TO DATE:  INSTAGRAM || TUMBLR  || YOUTUBE

The epitome of loneliness - fictional reviewer 2022

Bear the Shark is a short pay what you want visual novel with point and click elements about a shark named Bear who comes out of his comfort zone as he embarks on a journey to get back his legs. Will Bear find his legs again?

Search for the shark's beloved legs in locations such as the beach, a junkyard, and finally a small cottage. Point and click your way to finding answers that may lead to a different ending.  There is also humor that well, I find funny.

Look we have:

  • Probably funni humor:  Who doesn't like haha?
  • Characters: 4 little creatures all with their own personality and little quirks
  • My effort: I tried so hard and got so far...

Thank you for your time!

P.S: There is a webcomic called Bear the Shark made by me which is on Webtoon and Tapas
